seo.title: Premium Marble Supplier in UAE | Slabs, Cut-to-Size & Installation
seo.description: Madrid Marble supplies premium slabs and tiles in the UAE. Cut-to-size, finishing, fast delivery, and installation. Get a same-day quote.

og.title: Madrid Marble — Premium UAE Marble Supplier
og.description: Slabs, tiles, countertops, cut-to-size, and installation. Trusted by architects and contractors across the UAE.

hero.headline: Your trusted partner for quality marble works in the UAE
hero.description: Madrid Marble delivers luxury marble installation in Dubai, Abu Dhabi, and across the UAE. From precision CNC marble cutting services to on-site fabrication and seamless installation, we collaborate with architects and interior designers to transform villa, hotel, and commercial spaces.

image.alt: Luxury marble kitchen island in Dubai villa

testimonial.quote: Madrid Marble transformed our villa spaces with timeless precision.
testimonial.name: Residential client

about.title: Marble & Stone Specialists
copy: For more than a decade, Madrid Marble has supplied premium marble slabs, custom fabrication, and flawless installation throughout the UAE. Our ISO-certified workflows, rapid in-country logistics, and master craftsmen ensure every villa, hotel, and commercial lobby achieves enduring luxury.
From bespoke cut-to-size staircases to natural stone cladding, we partner with architects and interior designers to deliver projects on time with uncompromising precision.

gallery.alt: Luxury marble staircase with ambient lighting
Marble vanity countertop with soft lighting
Modern villa exterior with marble accents
Craftsman inspecting marble slab in showroom

services.title: What we do
services.description: Comprehensive marble fabrication & installation UAE wide—with precision tooling, on-site teams, and dedicated project managers for villas, hotels, and commercial towers.

items.title: Marble Installation
items.description: Precision setting for villas, hotels, and corporate lobbies with meticulous leveling, mitred edges, and joint finishing. On-site teams deliver fast UAE installation schedules.

items.title: Custom Fabrication
items.description: CNC profiling, waterjet cutting, bookmatching, and bespoke inlays crafted in our Dubai facility, ensuring flawless execution for architectural marble works.

items.title: Restoration & Polishing
items.description: Renew worn surfaces with crystallization, sealing, and scratch removal, preserving the brilliance of luxury marble installation Dubai wide.

items.title: Architectural Consultation
items.description: Material sourcing, sampling, and technical submittals for architects and designers, ensuring optimal stone selection for every application.

items.title: Maintenance Contracts
items.description: Scheduled inspection and upkeep programs for hotels, resorts, and commercial towers to maintain impeccable stone surfaces year-round.

portfolio.heading: Get inspired by our projects
portfolio.description: Explore how our premium marble slabs supplier UAE team crafts enduring interiors across villas, hotels, and commercial developments.

faq.title: Answering your questions
faq.description: Still exploring marble suppliers in Dubai or Abu Dhabi? Our team is ready to guide you with samples, site visits, and detailed quotations.

items.question: Do you provide free quotations?
items.answer: Yes. Share your drawings or scope and we will provide a detailed quotation with material options within 24 hours.

items.question: What’s the average lead time for installation?
items.answer: Standard villa or apartment fit-outs take 3–5 weeks from approval. Larger commercial projects are scheduled with phased delivery plans.

items.question: Do you import marble or stock locally?
items.answer: We maintain ready stock in our Dubai warehouse and source globally from Italy, Turkey, and Greece for specialty finishes.

items.question: Can I visit your Dubai showroom?
items.answer: Absolutely. Book a showroom visit to review slabs, finishes, and consult with our material specialists.

items.question: Do you handle cutting & polishing on-site?
items.answer: Our mobile teams handle on-site adjustments, polishing, and sealing to ensure a flawless installation.

items.question: Do you provide warranty on installation?
items.answer: Yes, all installations include a workmanship warranty along with maintenance guidance tailored to your project.

items.question: Can you work directly with architects or designers?
items.answer: We collaborate closely with architectural and design teams, providing samples, technical submittals, and value engineering.

contact.heading: Speak with the Madrid Marble team
contact.description: Share your drawings, timelines, and project details — our team will respond within 24 hours with tailored stone recommendations and showroom availability.
contact.intro_text: For project inquiries and showroom appointments, share your details below. We'll review your scope and respond within 24 hours with tailored stone recommendations, next steps, and available visit slots.
